ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2 (Dual Standby); 3G HSDPA 850 / 1900 (SIM 1 only)
Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) OS; 1 GHz ARM11 (CPU); microSD up to 32GB
4.5" Touchscreen; Wi-Fi; Bluetooth v2.1; GPS Navigation; 5MP + secondary VGA camera; Video
Stereo FM Radio; SNS integration; MP3/MP4 Player; Google Apps; SMS, MMS, Email, IM
ProductInfo.Name: NIU Tek 3G 4.0 N309 Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual SIM, Android 2.3 OS, 4" Touchscreen, 5MP Camera, Video, GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, FM Radio, MP3/MP4 Player, Social Networking and microSD Slot - Black
